Package DatabaseAccess

Class AccessAppointment

java.lang.Object
DatabaseAccess.AccessAppointment
public class AccessAppointment extends Object
AccessAppointment class used to write methods to move data to an from MySQL Database via Connection for all appointments.

    • addAppointment

      public static Boolean addAppointment(String titleInput, String descriptionInput, String locationInput, String typeInput, ZonedDateTime startInput, ZonedDateTime endInput, String createdByInput, String lastUpdatedByInput, Integer customerIDInput, Integer userIDInput, Integer contactIDInput) throws SQLException
      Is used to query the MySql Database to find all appointments and add them into the scheduling program.
      Parameters:
      titleInput - Title of the appointment.
      descriptionInput - Description of the appointment.
      locationInput - Location of the appointment.
      typeInput - Type of appointment.
      startInput - Start time of the appointment.
      endInput - End time of the appointment.
      createdByInput - User_ID of the user who created the appointment.
      lastUpdatedByInput - User_ID of the user who last updated the appointment.
      customerIDInput - The Customer_ID that the appointment is scheduled for.
      userIDInput - User_ID of user who the appointment is assigned to.
      contactIDInput - Contact_ID for the appointment.
      Returns:
      Boolean true or false.
      Throws:
      SQLException - SQLException.

    • updateAppointment

      public static Boolean updateAppointment(Integer apptIDInput, String titleInput, String descriptionInput, String locationInput, String typeInput, ZonedDateTime startInput, ZonedDateTime endInput, String lastUpdateByInput, Integer customerIDInput, Integer userIDInput, Integer contactIDInput) throws SQLException
      Used to update appointment details in the database by populating all data and allowing it to be adjusted.
      Parameters:
      apptIDInput - The Appointment_ID.
      titleInput - The appointment Title.
      descriptionInput - The appointment Description.
      locationInput - The appointment Location.
      typeInput - The appointment Type.
      startInput - Appointment Start.
      endInput - Appointment End.
      lastUpdateByInput - Appointment Last_Updated_By.
      customerIDInput - Appointment Customer_ID.
      userIDInput - Appointment User_ID.
      contactIDInput - Appointment Contact_ID.
      Returns:
      Boolean true or false.
      Throws:
      SQLException - SQLException.
